snippet: For the most part, the list of most-streamed songs for 18 cities in the United States align with standard pop charts. But the regional differences were revealing.
abstract: For the most part, the list of most-streamed songs for 18 cities in the United States align with standard pop charts. But the regional differences were revealing.

headline.main: Digital Notes: 'Call Me Maybe' Is an East Coast Hit, Spotify Says, but Gotye Is Tops
